Message:
The land was scarred
beyond recognition,
leaving our castle in ruins.
There, my beloved friend stands
at my side as I proclaim to her.

When I lost you,
my heart fell into hopelessness...
Then I realized something that
freed me from my despair.

Why I was able to become
the queen of this land...

and why I was able to keep
fighting until I saved you...
It was all because I loved you.

Dear Ophelia, allow me to
once again make my request.

From this day forth,
I wish for nothing else but
for you to stay by my side.
Forever, until death do us part.

Tears pour from Ophelia’s eyes
as I take her by the hands.

“We no longer needed any chains
to bind our lives together.”

“The sword is not
the master of our fate.
